snippet: Reports from the technology sector added to concerns that the economy was losing steam.
abstract: Stocks fall for a fourth consecutive day after a weak start to the earnings season, and a sharp decline in oil prices which sent energy shares sharply lower.
lead_paragraph: Reports from the technology sector added to concerns that the economy was losing steam.

headline.seo: Shares Fall on Concerns About Profit Growth
headline.main: Shares Fall on Concerns About Profit Growth
headline.print_headline: Shares Fall on Concerns About Profit Growth
